subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A sudden outbreak of no-hit syndrome struck a little nook of the Phillies’ clubhouse. But at least one hitless player could afford to laugh it off after solid pitching and a reliable bullpen preserved the victory.
snippet: A sudden outbreak of no-hit syndrome struck a little nook of the Phillies’ clubhouse. But at least one hitless player could afford to laugh it off after solid pitching and a reliable bullpen preserved the victory.
